title: Sample Space
text: There are $$8$$ total areas where the arrow can land on.
speech: There are  8  total areas where the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: total areas where the arrow can land on.

title: Red Slice
text: There is only $$1$$ red slice in the circle that the arrow can land on.
speech: There is only  1  red slice in the circle that the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: red slice in the circle that the arrow can land on.

title: Divide
text: Divide the number of ways the arrow can land on red by the total number of slices the arrow can land on.
speech: Divide the number of ways the arrow can land on red by the total number of slices the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: Divide the number of ways the arrow can land on red by the total number of slices the arrow can land on.
